name: The Whitetail Incident
description:
A short horror FPS made in 2 weeks for the MrKravin game jam.

A young park ranger went to investigate a strange call and hasn't been heard from for hours. As night approaches you figure that something has gone wrong and head out to find him. With your dog by your side and shotgun in hand, you venture into a forest full of evil cultists, strange rituals and ungodly creatures.

https://twitter.com/blakemprods
